org.apache.james.mailetcontainer.lib

Class AbstractStateCompositeProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailetcontainer.lib.AbstractStateCompositeProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, LogEnabled, MailProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CamelCompositeProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractStateCompositeProcessor
extends Object
implements MailProcessor, Configurable, LogEnabled
    Abstract base class for CamelCompositeProcessor which service the Mail with a CamelProcessor instances
